summary: A sexy Gothic dream girl, Crimzon is not only sassy and appealing to the eye, she has the power to seduce even kings of men. A RaceMenu preset of my latest character.
descriptionHtml:
**Quick Note - This is my first mod ever, so bear with me haha**

Hey, thanks for checking Crimzon out!

Description in short: 
A sexy Gothic dream girl, Crimzon is not only sassy and appealing to the eye, she has the power to seduce even kings of men. A RaceMenu preset of my latest character.

You can feel free to use the preset for any role-playing but personally I'd stick with the guidelines of sassy and seductive. Do what you want :)
If you want to use my preset publicly, you dont need permission from me, just make sure to credit me.


Here are the requirements:
SKSE
Racemenu
KS Hairdos - Renewal
Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- w/ Neater brows (darker) TexBlendLite and Face-Pack checked


Optional mods but extremely recommended! (as seen in the photos)
IMAGINATOR - Visual Control
DYNAVISION 
TEMBTRA Thief Armor - CBBE


HOW TO INSTALL:  
1.Copy the data folder into your Skyrim directory where the .EXE resides, it will be placed into Data/SKSE/Plugins/chargen/presets
2.Create a new Character or go into racemenu with your console by typing ShowRaceMenu
3.Set race to Nord and go to the presets tab, Press F9 to load the preset.
4.Select the one called "Crimzon.jslot"



*****************************************************************************************************************************************************************************
PERMISSION:
If you want to use my preset publicly, you dont need permission from me, just credit me. (yes I know I typed this twice, just wanted to make sure that was stated clearly) :)


CREDITS
Racemenu by Expired
KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky 
Imaginator by MyGoodEye and Gopher - with help from Vivanto and Deapri
Dynavision by Gopher and MyGoodEye 
Tembtra Thief Armor CBBE by Deserter X - Mitosuke
Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition by Caliente

Also thanks to: Immersive Animated Poses by: RohZima 
AND
Halo'sPoser by HaloFarm
author: Maoware
